text: Di Tagi la guu hai digau Syria gi hagalongo gi nia hagadilinga lee e logo, gadoo be nia lee gau dauwa dogologowaahee, mo nadau hoodo, mono waga dauwa hongo henua, gei digau Syria gu hagamaanadu bolo ma go di king o Israel gu gahi mai nia king o Hittite mo Egypt mo nadau gau dauwa belee heebagi gi ginaadou.
